verses.1: This is the account of Shem, Ham and Japheth, Noah's sons, who themselves had sons after the flood. The Japhethites
verses.2: The sons of Japheth: Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Meshech and Tiras.
verses.3: The sons of Gomer: Ashkenaz, Riphath and Togarmah.
verses.4: The sons of Javan: Elishah, Tarshish, the Kittim and the Rodanim.
verses.5: (From these the maritime peoples spread out into their territories by their clans within their nations, each with its own language.) The Hamites
verses.6: The sons of Ham: Cush, Mizraim, Put and Canaan.
verses.7: The sons of Cush: Seba, Havilah, Sabtah, Raamah and Sabteca. The sons of Raamah: Sheba and Dedan.
verses.8: Cush was the father of Nimrod, who grew to be a mighty warrior on the earth.
verses.9: He was a mighty hunter before the LORD; that is why it is said, "Like Nimrod, a mighty hunter before the LORD."
verses.10: The first centers of his kingdom were Babylon, Erech, Akkad and Calneh, in Shinar.
verses.11: From that land he went to Assyria, where he built Nineveh, Rehoboth Ir, Calah
verses.12: and Resen, which is between Nineveh and Calah; that is the great city.
verses.13: Mizraim was the father of the Ludites, Anamites, Lehabites, Naphtuhites,
verses.14: Pathrusites, Casluhites (from whom the Philistines came) and Caphtorites.
verses.15: Canaan was the father of Sidon his firstborn, and of the Hittites,
verses.19: and the borders of Canaan reached from Sidon toward Gerar as far as Gaza, and then toward Sodom, Gomorrah, Admah and Zeboiim, as far as Lasha.
verses.18: Arvadites, Zemarites and Hamathites. Later the Canaanite clans scattered
verses.21: Sons were also born to Shem, whose older brother was Japheth; Shem was the ancestor of all the sons of Eber.
verses.20: These are the sons of Ham by their clans and languages, in their territories and nations. The Semites
verses.23: The sons of Aram: Uz, Hul, Gether and Meshech.
verses.22: The sons of Shem: Elam, Asshur, Arphaxad, Lud and Aram.
verses.25: Two sons were born to Eber: One was named Peleg, because in his time the earth was divided; his brother was named Joktan.
verses.24: Arphaxad was the father of Shelah, and Shelah the father of Eber.
verses.26: Joktan was the father of Almodad, Sheleph, Hazarmaveth, Jerah,
verses.29: Ophir, Havilah and Jobab. All these were sons of Joktan.
verses.31: These are the sons of Shem by their clans and languages, in their territories and nations.
verses.30: The region where they lived stretched from Mesha toward Sephar, in the eastern hill country.
verses.32: These are the clans of Noah's sons, according to their lines of descent, within their nations. From these the nations spread out over the earth after the flood.
